comment.author: 26220432@N06
comment._content:
** translation of describtion **

Second World War, zeewar general. Looking for mines in the Eastern Sea: fife granats have been lifted up from the sea. 1941

comment.author: 49503090841@N01
comment._content: zeewar: War at sea. WWII: War at sea. Minesweeper in the Baltic sea. Five shells were lifted. -- Seen on your photo stream. (?)

comment.author: 12306929@N04
comment._content: They look more like artillery projectiles than sea mines.
